Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォン
Entry.EnglishText: Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォンの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォンの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ…… 行こうぜ、<Veigue>！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Yeah. Let's go, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここが終点か……
Entry.EnglishText: We've reached the end...

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ……さん？
Entry.EnglishText: Ms. Selena...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴じゃねえ！ いいかげんに正体を現しやがれ！
Entry.EnglishText: That is NOT my sister! How about you knock it off and show yourself already!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我は、聖獣イーフォン。 この世界の「闇」を司る者だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I am the Sacred Beast known as Eephon. I am the one who governs over all that is Shade in this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣!? ゲオルギアスの他にも 聖獣がいたのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred Beast?! You mean there are others besides Geyorkias?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我は、時に<Blue>闇の力<White>と呼ばれ、 時に<Yellow>聖者<White>と呼ばれる。
Entry.EnglishText: At times I am called the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>, at times I am called a <Yellow>Saint<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖者<White>って事は…… ゲオルギアスの手先じゃないんだな？ <Blue>闇の力<White>は、<Yellow>聖者の力<White>なんだな？
Entry.EnglishText: A <Yellow>Saint<White>? Then that means that you don't actually work for Geyorkias, right? Does that mean that the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> <Italic>is</Italic> the <Yellow>Power of the Saints<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>よ、汝の考え、 しかと聞かせてもらった。 その言葉に偽りはないか。 その言葉に迷いはないか。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, you have conveyed your thoughts to me. Are your words without deceit? Are your words without doubt?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、偽りも迷いもない。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>はみんな<Cyan>同じ<White>だ。 <Yellow>気持ち<White>ってヤツが！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I believe every word that I said. All <Yellow>Human<White> beings are the <Cyan>same<White>, because we all have the same <Yellow>feelings<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、おれにおまえの力を 貸してくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: So please, lend me your power!

Entry.JapaneseText: よかろう……だがその前に、 汝に我の力を使いこなすに足る力量が あるかどうか、試させてもらう。 我と闘い、その力を示せ。
Entry.EnglishText: Very well... However, before I can grant you my power, I must test to see if you are capable of wielding it. Do battle with me, and show me your strength.

Entry.JapaneseText: 要するに、おまえに勝てばいいんだな。 よっしゃあ！ やってやるぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: So all I have to do is win against you, huh? Not a problem! Bring it on!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Tytree>を含む パーティ編成にしてください。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Make sure the party composition includes <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……見事だ、<Tytree>……
Entry.EnglishText: Magnificent, <Tytree>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 約束だぜ……<Blue>闇の力<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: You promised. Lend me the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が聖獣の力とフォルスは 源を同じくするもの。 汝の心が揺らげば力も揺らぎ、 やがて、汝自身を呑み込むであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: My power as a Sacred Beast and your Force are of the same origin. Should your heart falter, so too will your powers. And if such comes to pass, you shall surely be consumed by them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 覚悟はできているか。
Entry.EnglishText: Is your resolve sufficient?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、迷うくらいなら はなからここにはいないぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Of course. If it wasn't, I wouldn't have made it here in the first place.

Entry.JapaneseText: ならばフォルスを……
Entry.EnglishText: Then manifest your Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が力…… 受け取るがよい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...And take my power unto yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: おおっ…… これが、聖獣の力か……
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa... So this is the power of a Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どんな感じ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What's it like?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヤバイぜ、こいつは。 気を抜いたら、 すぐに暴走しそうだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh man, it's intense! I get the feeling that I'll lose control if I'm not careful.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふえぇ、ちょっと コワイんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: Uhh, that's kinda unsettling...

Entry.JapaneseText: 汝らが挑まんとする相手には、 それだけの力が必要なのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: This power is needed against that which you will face.

Entry.JapaneseText: 教えてくれ、聖獣イーフォン。 ガジュマがヒューマを憎んだり、 争いが起こったりしてるのは、 本当に<Blue>思念<White>ってヤツのせいなのか？
Entry.EnglishText: So Sacred Beast Eephon, could you tell me something. Is all this hatred and fighting between Gajuma and Huma because of the <Blue>Will<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ…… 汝ら<Yellow>ヒト<White>が<Blue>思念<White>と呼ぶものが この世界に満ちようとしている。
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed... That which you <Yellow>Humans<White> call the <Blue>Will<White>, shall soon take hold of the entire world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>思念<White>を<Red>浄化<White>しなければ、 大いなる災いが訪れるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: If this <Blue>Will<White> is not <Red>purified<White>, then a great calamity will transpire.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>思念<White>を<Red>浄化<White>する？ どうすれば<Red>浄化<White>できるんだ？ <Blue>闇の力<White>を使えばいいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Red>Purify<White> the <Blue>Will<White>? How are we supposed to do that? Is the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> not enough?

Entry.JapaneseText: それは<Yellow>すべての聖獣の力<White>を 得る事ができれば、わかるであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: You shall come to understand when you have gathered the power of <Yellow>every Sacred Beast<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>すべての聖獣<White>…… それはどこにいるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: The power of <Yellow>every Sacred Beast<White>... Where are the others?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「陽炎の荒野に眠れる翼を 呼び覚ませ」<White>
Entry.EnglishText: "<Cyan>Wake the Sleeping Wings within the wasteland's shimmering haze.<White>"

Entry.JapaneseText: 陽炎の荒野？ <Blue>眠れる翼<White>？ ナニそれ？
Entry.EnglishText: Wasteland's shimmering haze? <Blue>Sleeping Wings<White>? Come again?

Entry.JapaneseText: その先は自分たちで考えるがよい。 汝ら、自らの導き出したる答を信じよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You must figure the rest out on your own.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと待って……ゲオルギアスは あなたたちにとっても敵じゃないの？ 同じ敵なら、どうしてこんな 回りくどい事を……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait just a minute... You Sacred Beasts consider Geyorkias to be your enemy, do you not? If we share a common foe, then what's the point of all this roundabout nonsense...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らは天より与えられた務めを 果たしているまで。
Entry.EnglishText: We are merely fulfilling the mission which has been ordained by the Heavens.

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>よ……我は願う。 その瞳に何を映そうとも、 汝のまなざしがまっすぐに 前を見つめ続ける事を。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>... I have a request. No matter what is reflected in your eyes, you must continue to steer your gaze forward.

Entry.JapaneseText: 理想を語るなかれ。 その身をもって理想となれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Do not merely speak of your ideals. Embody those ideals with your entire being.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ、やってみる。
Entry.EnglishText: All right... I'll do my best!

Entry.JapaneseText: さらばだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Farewell.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Tytree>は 奥義『蒼破墜蓮閃』が 習得可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><Tytree> is now able to learn the Fusion Force, "Azure Spark."

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: ...There was nothing like this the last time we were here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: Lucky! We didn't see anything like this last time!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... I don't think there was anything last time...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: I never expected to find a path here of all places. How odd.

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, a discovery in a place like this, huh! What a surprise!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: Here of all places... I guess things like this happen, huh.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
Entry.EnglishText: Seems you can stumble upon something new even in a place you've visited before, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Exploring might reveal something new and exciting, even if you've been here before!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: It goes to show you can make new discoveries in old places.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it possible that even in spots you've visited before, you might stumble upon something new by searching like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
Entry.EnglishText: It just goes to show, there's always something new to find if you keep your eyes open and explore!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
Entry.EnglishText: Even in spots you've been to before, if you give them another look, you might stumble upon something new.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation
